sentences.en: At any rate, it was a long uphill struggle for them.
sentences.cn: 无论如何,对他们说来, 这是一场长期的艰苦的斗争.

sentences.en: Dragging the load uphill was tough work for the horse.
sentences.cn: 拖货物上坡对马来说是很困难的工作.

sentences.en: He had been running uphill a long way.
sentences.cn: 他已经跑了一段很长的上坡路。

sentences.en: He has an uphill battle against rheumatics.

sentences.en: It had been an uphill struggle to achieve what she had wanted.

sentences.en: It's an uphill battle but I think we're going to win.
sentences.cn: 虽然这是一场艰苦的斗争，但我相信我们会取得胜利。

sentences.en: She was hot and breathless from the exertion of cycling uphill.

sentences.en: The car pulled away from the lorry as soon as they started going uphill.
sentences.cn: 一开始爬山,小汽车就与卡车拉开了距离.

sentences.en: The man was no more than ten yards away and slightly uphill.
sentences.cn: 那名男子就在10码之内，稍近山顶。

sentences.en: The road stretches uphill at a steep slope.

sentences.en: The walk from the village to Greystones was uphill all the way.
sentences.cn: 从村子到格雷斯通斯走的一直都是上坡路。

sentences.en: You have to gear down when you drive uphill.
sentences.cn: 上坡行驶时必须换慢挡.
